contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Maarkedal |picture=Maarkedal - Ladeuze - helling - Belgium.jpg |picture-legend=Ladeuze Hamlet in Etikhove (2008) |map=MaarkedalLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Maarkedal in East Flanders |arms=Maarkedalwapen.jpg |flag=Flag of Maarkedal.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-OV}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Oudenaarde|Oudenaarde]] |nis=45064 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor= Peter Thienpont |majority=[[Flemish Liberals and Democrats|VLD]] |postal-codes=9680, 9681, 9688 |telephone-area=055 |web=[http://www.maarkedal.be/ www.maarkedal.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=48 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=37 }} '''Maarkedal''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[East Flanders]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Etikhove]], [[Maarke-Kerkem]], [[Nukerke]] and [[Schorisse]], and part of the hamlet of [[Louise-Marie, Belgian hamlet|Louise-Marie]]. On January 1, 2006 Maarkedal had a total population of 6,468. The total area is 45.63 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 142 inhabitants per km². ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.maarkedal.be Official website ] {{nl icon}} {{East_Flanders}} [[Category:Municipalities of East Flanders]] [[Category:Maarkedal]] {{EastFlanders-geo-stub}}
